description: A basic iOS native Swift application template using Salesforce Mobile SDK with MobileSync, SwiftUI, and Combine. This template provides a foundation for building iOS apps that integrate with Salesforce, featuring basic authentication, account listing, and contact management capabilities.
useCase: Use this template when you need to create a basic iOS native app that integrates with Salesforce using Swift, SwiftUI, and Combine. It's ideal for developers starting with Salesforce Mobile SDK who want a minimal but functional starting point.

customizationPoints.description: Customize the app name, package name, and organization details
instructions: Update template.js with new app name, package name, and organization
Modify package.json with new app name
Update Xcode project files with new identifiers
Update entitlements file with new package name

customizationPoints.description: Add new Salesforce objects beyond the default Account and Contact
instructions: Create new model files for additional SObjects
Add SmartStore queries for new objects
Create corresponding SwiftUI views for new objects

customizationPoints.description: Customize the authentication and login experience
instructions: Modify AppDelegate.swift to customize SDK initialization
Update LoginTypeSelectionViewController for custom login flows
Configure push notification handling if needed

customizationPoints.description: Extend the SwiftUI interface with additional components
instructions: Add new SwiftUI views for additional functionality
Customize the UI theme and styling
